name: Sombrio Pinner Shorts - Men's
description: Tackle tough trails. The Pinner Shorts were made for gritty mountain terrain. Burly construction plus stretch means they can take a bail and keep going. The DWR finish keeps mud spray from soaking in.Durable nylon and spandex stretch fabric has a DWR treatment to shed moisture and mud.Adjustable waistband system gives a customized fit.Seamless crotch panel for a chafe-free ride.Zippered front and rear pockets with 1 lift pass cord.Mesh lined zippered thigh vents let you release heat on warm days.Bar tack stitching in stress zones for durability.Standard fit.
